summary: A basic recolor of the vanilla Nord Hero weapons to give them a more rustic and gold feel. HQ textures. Stand alone + Replacer Available. Draugr replacer is also an option.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]About:[/u][/b]

Crafting is available, no perks needed, only a few gold ingots. Upgrading the weapons is also available, however you must have the steel smithing perk do do this. I don\'t have the best PC so the screens look shabby but the textures are HQ. Quiver re-color is also included. Arrows can be crafted (1 gold ingot + 1 Firewood = 15 arrows). There is a chest in qasmoke where you can find the weapons, the vanilla set is also in the chest so you can compare. 

Install with NMM.

[b][u] Available Downloads: [/b][/u]

[b]-Main File :[/b] 
[u]Rustic Nord Hero Weapon Set[/u] - Stand Alone (as well as the re-color, these weapons have different Stats from the vanilla)

[b]-Optional Files :[/b] 
1)[u]Rustic Nord Hero Weapon Set -Replacer[/u] - This replaces the vanilla nord hero weapons (Stats are the same as vanilla)
2)[u]Draugr Replacer[/u] - Replaces the draugr weapon set with the rustic colors. (Magic bow, sword and BattleAxe are not included)


[b][u]Details of changes to the weapons :[/u][/b] (Main File Changes)

- Color (view pictures)

From the vanilla the weapons all have +2 weight (gold is heavier) +10 value and +3 Damage.

[b]Rustic Arrow[/b] 
- Damage: 26
- Value: 7
 
[b]Rustic Battle Axe[/b] 
- Damage: 24
- Value: 315
- Wight: 22

[b]Rustic Greatsword[/b] 
- Damage: 23
- Value: 265
- Weight: 18

[b]Rustic Sword[/b] 
- Damage: 14
- Value: 145
- Weight: 11

[b]Rustic Bow[/b]
- Damage: 14
- Value: 210
- Weight: 9

[b]Rustic War Axe[/b]
- Damage: 15
- value: 175
- Weight: 13

Hope you like them. If you have any ideas for improvements feel free to list them in the comments like wise with any requests or changes you would like to see.

My other Mods :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27433/]Ebony Bow and Blade[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27396/]Darker Daedric[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24712/]Riverhome -riverwood-[/url]
author: xooki3
